newsitem.title: USA: IPO FILING-Power Computing files 3 mln shrs.
newsitem.headline: IPO FILING-Power Computing files 3 mln shrs.

text.p: Power Computing Corp filed Monday with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to register an initial public offering of up to three million common shares it expects to sell between $8 and $10 each.
Underwriters for the offering, Prudential Securities Inc and Salomon Brothers Inc, have an over-allotment option of up to 450,000 shares.

The Round Rock, Texas direct marketer of personal computers said proceeds from the sale, an estimated $24 million, will be used to reduce outstanding bank debt, fund development and fund other working capital needs.
After the offering, the company will have 17,719,113 common shares outstanding.
